name: Summoner's Escape
description:
Locked up in the depth of the dungeon due to your unusual powers, fight your way back up to the throne room to earn your freedom by killing the king.

On the way, gather an onslaught of useful weapons which will follow your every move to a T. Use them to gain an advantage over the increasingly more equiped defenders of the monarch.

A simple short game made for the Software Design and Implementation module at ARU.

Asset Credits
  • Art (Tileset/Characters/Items) by Kenney: https://www.kenney.nl/assets/bit-pack
  • Font (thaleah) by Rick Hoppmann: https://tinyworlds.artstation.com/
